segments.text: Yes , I'd like to have this parcel delivered to Shanghai .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , we only take care of mail . For parcels , you can go to the next window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks ! ... Hello , I have a parcel to deliver .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you need it to be delivered to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to post it to Shanghai .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please fill out this form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what's the postcode of Shanghai ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment , let me check it out for you . It's 200085 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , here you go . What's the postage , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , let me put it on the scale . It weighs up to 10kg and that will be 30 Yuan , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ten kg ! Dear Shirley must have put a lead ball in it !
segments.speaker: S2
